name: Tino
notes: Tino is a good old man, a great rope horse and now in his old age a wonderful kids mount!

name: Tillman
notes: Tillman is a Bay Roan gleding who has been used for team roping as a heal horse.

name: Bob
notes: Bob is a nice horse. He is trained in team roping as a head and heel horse. He is also great with kids!

name: Cowboy
notes: Cowboy love his food and loves to graze. He is a great horse for advance kids. He has recenlty been tuned up and roped off.

name: Frog
notes: Frog is a funny horse. He is full of personality and will give you a good laugh. He is a great horse to ride for kids and adults. He can get a little spicy sometimes.

name: Sylvie
notes: Sylvie is a sassy mare. She was used as a heel horse, but has since been working her way towards being a ranch riding horse. She is a fun horse to ride, very smart and very responsive.
